alert.note: Alert for Ogemaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 16 at 12:04AM EST until December 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the DENSE FOG ADVISORY, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the WIND ADVISORY, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Ogemaw County. * WHEN...For the DENSE FOG ADVISORY, until 7 AM EST this morning. For the WIND ADVISORY, until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
